cut_off_date.description: After this date, unit primitive has no free access

deprecated_by_url.description: URL of merge request where the unit primitive was deprecated

deprecation_message.description: Message explaining why the unit primitive is deprecated and any additional context

documentation_url.description: URL of documentation for introduced Unit Primitive

feature_category.description: The feature category that introduced the unit primitive

group.description: The group that introduced the unit primitive, e.g. "group::duo chat"

introduced_by_url.description: URL of merge request introducing the Unit Primitive

milestone.description: Milestone in which the Unit Primitive was introduced

min_gitlab_version.description: Minimum gitlab version required to use this Unit Primitive

min_gitlab_version_for_free_access.description: Minimum gitlab version required to use this Unit Primitive while it has free access

unit_primitive_issue_url.description: Url of original unit primitive issue
